杇字的基本解释

杇
wū
同“圬”。

杇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wū］
［《廣韻》哀都切，平模，影。］
(1)泥抹子。涂墙的工具。
(2)粉刷，涂饰。

杇字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杇； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页511第02
【唐韻】哀都切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】汪胡切，?音烏。【說文】所以塗也。秦謂之杇，關東謂之槾。《爾雅·釋宮》鏝謂之杇。註泥鏝。【增韻】塗鏝器。或作圬。亦作釫。　又【集韻】洪孤切，音乎。又【五音集韻】烏故切，音汙。義?同。

考證：〔【說文】所以塗也。【爾雅·釋宮】杇鏝謂之杇。【方言】秦謂之杇，關東謂之槾。〕　謹按秦謂之杇二語出說文不出方言。謹改爲：說文所以塗也。秦謂之杇，關東謂之槾。爾雅釋宮鏝謂之杇。註泥鏝。
杇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
杇字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
plaster
wū
Same as "圬".
plaster
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wū］
["Guangyun" mourning all cut, flat model, shadow. ]
(1) Mud trowel. Tools for painting walls.
(2) Painting and finishing.
plaster
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杇; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 511 02
[Tang Yun] Aidu cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Wang Hu cut,? Yinwu. [Said Wen] So Tu also. Qin said that it was 杇, and Guandong said it was 槾. The trowel in "Erya Shigong" is called 杇. Pour mud trowel. 【Enhance rhyme】coating trowel. Or make a joke. Also known as pi.　[Jiyun] Hong Guqie, sound almost. Also [Pentagram Rhyme] Wu Gu is cut, and the sound is dirty. Righteous? Same. Research: [[Said Wen] So Tu Ye. 【Erya·Shigong】杇镘 is called 杇. [Dialect] Qin called Zhili, and Guandong called Zhili. 〕 　 I would like to speak in the second language of Qin Zhizhi, but no dialect. I would like to change it to: Speaking of the text, so it is painted. Qin said that it was 杇, and Guandong said it was 槾. Erya releases the palace trowel that is called 杇. Pour mud trowel.
